        amount - The amount of money the players get.

      • action

        public void action(Player player)
        Transformer

        Precondition: player must be valid instance of class Player. Postcondition: Based on the type of tile performs the sweeptakes,casino,yardsale action methods.

        Overrides:

      • sweeptakesAction

        public void sweeptakesAction(Player player)
        Transformer

        Precondition: player must be valid instance of class Player and the case of the actions method must be SWEEPTAKES. Postcondition: Performs the actions described in the tile.

        Parameters:
        player - The player.
